title: NFC East Preview
itunes:title: NFC East Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – discuss the latest NFL news, including Eagles offensive tackle Lane Johnson facing a 10-game suspension and Patriots defensive end Rob Ninkovich suffering torn tricep muscle in training camp. Then the heroes recap the first episode of “Hard Knocks” before ending the podcast previewing the NFC East.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
